overview: Jimmy Hansen is not afraid of death, but at just over 40 neither is he ready to embrace it. Ready or not, though, heaven comes calling when Jimmy suffers a heart attack. Now, as doctors try to save him, Jimmy gets a tour of his "mansion" in the sky. Turns out, it's not such a bad place -- especially when he encounters his guardian angel, childhood dog, mom and more in this Christian family drama starring Barry McGuire and Terry Talbot.
title: Jimmy Hansen's Heaven
